versions.name: Unusual Linux Process Calling the Metadata Service v100.0.0
versions.description: Looks for anomalous access to the metadata service by an unusual process. The metadata service may be targeted in order to harvest credentials or user data scripts containing secrets.
author: Elastic
false_positives: A newly installed program or one that runs very rarely as part of a monthly or quarterly workflow could trigger this detection rule.
